sledgehammer.module.npc

Class ModuleNPC

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.plugin.Module
        • sledgehammer.module.npc.ModuleNPC

  • public class ModuleNPC
extends Module
    Module to handle NPC data and operations for the Core Plug-in of Sledgehammer.

    TODO: Rewrite NPCs and remove the NPCManager.

    Author:
    Jab

                                                    float x,

        Parameters:
        name - The String name of the NPC.
        x - The Float x-coordinate to spawn the NPC.
        y - The Float y-coordinate to spawn the NPC.
        z - The Float z-coordinate to spawn the NPC.
        Returns:
        Returns a NPC instance with the String name, spawned at the given Float coordinates.
